short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Analyze your job suitability using custom Profile, and also creates a personalized Cover letter in PDF for Job Application.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🌟 Analyse job Suitability and Get Personalised Cover Letter with the power of Chat GPT 4 Turbo:

Welcome to the ultimate tool for job seekers - the Job Suitability Analyzer and Cover Letter Creator! 🚀 This innovative Chrome extension is designed to revolutionize your job application process. Whether you're a recent graduate entering the workforce or an experienced professional looking for a career change, our extension is tailored to make your job application journey as seamless and successful as possible. 🎯

🔍 Feature 1: Analyse Your Job Suitability

Struggling to find the right job that matches your skills and experience? Worry no more! Our AI-driven job suitability analysis tool is here to help. 🧠 Simply input your professional profile – including your skills, experiences, and career preferences – and let the AI algorithm do the rest. You'll receive a comprehensive score out of 10 and an analysis that matches you with jobs that suit your profile, increasing your chances of landing your dream job. 💼

✍️ Feature 2: Personalised Cover Letter Generator

First impressions matter, and nothing makes a better first impression than a well-crafted cover letter. Our extension comes equipped with a state-of-the-art cover letter generator. 📝 By leveraging the details from your professional profile, it creates a bespoke cover letter that highlights your strengths and suitability for the job. Customise it further to add your personal touch! InBuilt One Click Download to PDF.

📚 How It Works:

Profile Setup: Start by creating your profile at ai.digestprompt.io. 📋

Job Suitability Analysis: Click on the 'Analyze Suitability' button. Our AI will assess your profile against current job market trends and available positions to find the perfect match. 📊

Cover Letter Creation: Once you have a job in mind, use our cover letter tool to generate a personalized letter. Edit and customize it as needed. 🖌️

Export in PDF: Ready to apply? Export your tailored cover letter in a professional PDF format, ready to be attached to your job application. 📤
